messages.title: Demand better for our public services
messages.content: The chaos of Brexit means our vital public services are being ignored. The NHS is in crisis with operations cancelled and long waits to see a GP. Matt Sanders wants to focus on better public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit to focus on what matters – better funding for public services and tackling the climate emergency.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The next general election in Hampstead and Kilburn will be a simple choice between Matt Sanders and Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate. The Conservatives finished LAST at the most recent elections here and they struggled to find a candidate for the present. Even local Conservative party members have given up any hope of winning here.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit to focus on what matters – better funding for public services and tackling the climate emergency.
issues.health: The NHS is in crisis with operations cancelled and long waits to see a GP.

housing.content: Demand better for our public services

endorsements.endorsement: The failure of the motion to back remaining in the EU at Labour's conference confirms what we knew: Labour is not a party of Remain but a party of fence-sitting on the biggest issue facing the UK since WW2. Led by a Brexiter.

quotes.text: At the next general election, voters will choose the kind of country we want to be... We can defeat nationalism and populism. We can change our politics, stop Brexit and win a brighter future.
There is renewed confusion over Jeremy Corbyn's Brexit position after the rejection of the Labour motion in a new EU referendum.
The Lib Dems won handsomely in nearly all the wards across the constituency in May's European elections and they have momentum.

images.caption: Matt Sanders with supporters and text about stopping Brexit.
Graph showing Lib Dem lead in a local poll.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Former Labour MPs such as Chuka Umunna have joined Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats to stop Brexit.
